title: SHIROBAKO the Movie
overview: Four years after the events of SHIROBAKO the series, Musashino Animation has gone through unprecedented changes and things are looking bleak for the studio. One day, Aoi Miyamori is offered a role managing a new theatrical animation project. With only a few months left before the deadline, can MusAni complete the project in its current state? Itâ€™s up to Aoi to work alongside both familiar faces and new to finish the project in time!
